metadata.name: 6.4.2 Level of water stress freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources
metadata.target: 6.4 By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity
metadata.definition: Gross abstraction as percentage of total renewable resources.
metadata.methodology: The intensity of use of freshwater resources (or water stress) refers to gross abstraction of freshwater taken from ground or surfaces waters expressed in % of total available renewable freshwater resources (including water inflows from neigboring countries).
